meanings.sent1: Before baking the cake, I need to presift the flour to remove any lumps.
meanings.sent2: It is important to presift the ingredients before mixing them together.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally presifted the sugar twice, making the cake extra sweet!
meanings.sent4: Her meticulous nature led her to presift through every detail of the project.
meanings.sent5: The chef's secret to a perfect dish is to presift the spices for optimal flavor.

meanings.sent1: The presift of the flour saved time during the baking process.
meanings.sent2: A presift of the soil helped the archaeologists uncover hidden artifacts.
meanings.sent3: The presift of the sand revealed tiny seashells, much to the children's delight.
meanings.sent4: His careful presift of the evidence led to a breakthrough in the case.
meanings.sent5: The presift of the documents ensured that only relevant information was presented.
